chapters.title: Chapter 24: To Make a Stand
chapters.info: Jaim Dawtry, p. 397—Young man from the Two Rivers. He serves as one of the guards at Perrin and Faile's tent. Jaim also made an appearance during Egwene's test for the Accepted: he brought Egwene and Rand al'Thor odd news from Baerlon: people were at war, fighting the “Shawkin,” “Sanchan,” or “something like that.”
